Glazed Lists Licensing

Glazed Lists is distributed under your choice of two popular open source
licenses, the LGPL and the MPL.
  * You may distribute Glazed Lists free of charge
  * You may use Glazed Lists in a commercial or closed source application
  * You may not create a closed-source fork of Glazed Lists

The full text of the licenses is available online:
  MPL: http://www.mozilla.org/MPL/MPL-1.1.html
  LGPL: http://www.gnu.org/copyleft/lesser.html

If you have any license questions, please take advantage of our
mailing list: users@glazedlists.dev.java.net

Copyright (c) 2003-2005, publicobject.com, O'Dell Engineering Limited
http://publicobject.com/glazedlists/
